name: Super Chef World
description:
Welcome to your own amazing kitchen.
Super Chef World restaurant game is the marvelous treat for all the food – cooking and restaurant management games lovers.
Tap to cook delicious and yummy dishes in your own kitchen. It is the time to cook your favorite unique food recipe, which you have learnt by your mommy.
Cook food of different flavors with professional machines. Acid, bitter, sweet, or spicy. Cook hamburger, seafood, spaghetti, steak. Make cola, juice or milk tea. Make sweet ice cream cone, cupcake.
MORE RESTAURANTS TO COME
Stay tuned for the next restaurants in this cooking game.
